lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Dealers noted that market confidence had already been at a low ebb, with much of the recent impressive rise whittled away last week as investors reacted nervously to opinion polls showing unexpectedly strong gains for the centrist Liberal/Social Democratic alliance.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The latest period of weakness for the dollar has accentuated fears that currency risk might induce Japanese investors in particular to undertake dramatic reductions in their portfolios of U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The market had been sustained in large part during its recent rally by a virtual conviction that the ruling Conservative party would first call and then win a general election early this summer.
